Massage & Wellness

​​Zen Happens Massage and Wellness offers holistic services: massage therapy, acupuncture, yoga, energy healing,  organic facials, and waxing.

Please note that we require appointments. We try to accommodate last minute appointments if you call 410-746-0499

Our Philosophy

Our mission is to make preventative and restorative lifelong health solutions accessible to YOU. We believe in providing essentials for a healthy body, both on the inside and the outside, using natural methods that are chemical-free and allow you to take responsibility for your health.
